heading: What is Duckies?
content: Duckies is a community project built on the Binance Smart Chain (BSC) with $DUCKIE as its ecosystem token. We are a community driven project bringing the adoption of Duckies NFT integration and gamification on the platform (P2E)

heading: What is the ecosystem token?
content: $DUCKIE is the ecosystem token listed on Pancakeswap (the leading DEX on the BSC network)

heading: Is the liquidity locked?
content: Yes! We have locked our liquidity for 2 years and would extend the lock period at the end of the 2-year period. This is to assure our investors that we are not a "rugpull" scheme

heading: Will there be token burn?
content: Yes! We have commited 20% of our token to burn. Decisions on commiting more token to burn would be made in the future

heading: How can I help?
content: You can help by joining our ever growing community, refer your friends and shill us on social media

heading: What are the plans for the future?
content: Duckies community is commited to building value. In the future, we will create our P2E game, Duckies NFT and a NFT marketplace to support the ecosystem
